light.$description: color.overlay.light — Light theme overlay (50% opacity). Use for: modal backdrops, drawer overlays on light backgrounds.

dark.$description: color.overlay.dark — Dark theme overlay (75% opacity). Use for: modal backdrops on dark backgrounds, higher contrast overlays.

error.$description: color.alpha.error — Error state semi-transparent background (15% red)

success.$description: color.alpha.success — Success state semi-transparent background (15% green)

warning.$description: color.alpha.warning — Warning state semi-transparent background (15% yellow)

info.$description: color.alpha.info — Info state semi-transparent background (15% blue)

selected.$description: color.alpha.selected — Selected state semi-transparent background (20% blue)

default.$description: color.text.default — Primary text color. Use for: headings, body text, labels.

secondary.$description: color.text.secondary — Secondary/muted text. Use for: helper text, captions, descriptions.

placeholder.$description: color.text.placeholder — Placeholder text in form inputs.

disabled.$description: color.text.disabled — Text color for disabled elements.

inverse.$description: color.text.inverse — Inverse text for dark backgrounds.

selected.$description: color.text.selected — Text color for selected state.

onDefault.$description: color.text.onDefault — Text on default component backgrounds.

elevated.$description: color.bg.surface.elevated — Elevated surface background (hover states, raised panels).

hover.$description: color.bg.interactive.hover — Neutral hover background for interactive elements.

light.$description: color.action.bg.light — Primary light variant background.

primary.$description: color.action.text.primary — Text on primary action backgrounds.

onSurface.$description: color.action.text.onSurface — Action-colored text on surface backgrounds. Use for: outline/subtle button text, badge outline text, tab active text.

light.$description: color.action.text.light — Text on primary light backgrounds.

glow.$description: color.focus.glow — Focus ring glow/background color. Use for: input focus ring.

light.$description: color.primary.light — Primary light background.
badge.bg.light — Light badge background color.
badge.text.light — Light badge text color.

hover.$description: button.bg.outline.hover — Outline button hover background color.

light.$description: button.bg.light — Light button background color.

subtle.$description: button.bg.subtle — Subtle button background color. Transparent by default.

filled.$description: button.text.filled — Filled button text color for contrast on action background.

light.$description: button.text.light — Light button text color.

error.$description: input.border.error — Error state input border color.

focus.$description: input.ring.focus — Focus ring glow color around input.

header.$description: modal.border.header — Modal header bottom border color.

footer.$description: modal.border.footer — Modal footer top border color.

off.$description: switch.track.off — Off state track background color.

on.$description: switch.track.on — On state track background color.
switch.thumb.on — Switch thumb color when on.

inset.$description: boxShadow.inset — Inset shadow - pressed/recessed appearance. Use for: pressed button states, input:focus, toggle switches (off state), embedded content areas. Creates illusion of pressing INTO the surface. Common in: Button:active, pressed toggles, embedded wells, search input backgrounds.

none.$description: boxShadow.none — No shadow - flat appearance. Use for: flat design elements, removing inherited shadows, elements that should appear flush with background, focus states that use outline instead. CSS keyword. Common in: flat buttons, inline elements, focus states using outline.

body.$value: Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
body.$description: fontFamilies.body — Body font stack for CCUI 2.1 theme. Open Sans is a humanist sans-serif typeface with excellent legibility.

heading.$value: Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
heading.$description: fontFamilies.heading — Heading font stack for CCUI 2.1 theme. Uses Open Sans for consistent typography across headings and body.

mono.$value: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace
mono.$description: fontFamilies.mono — Monospace font stack for code and technical content. Use for: code blocks, inline code, terminal output, data tables with alignment needs, API references. ui-monospace uses system default (SF Mono on Mac, Cascadia on Windows 11). Fallbacks cover all major platforms. All characters have equal width for alignment.

0.$description: opacity.0 — Fully transparent (0%). Use for: hidden elements, animation start states, invisible interactive areas. Element is invisible but may still be interactive. CSS: opacity: 0; visibility: hidden for truly hidden.

5.$description: opacity.5 — 5% opacity - barely visible. Use for: extremely subtle hover states, ghost backgrounds, near-invisible separators. Only visible against high-contrast backgrounds.

10.$description: opacity.10 — 10% opacity - subtle transparency. Use for: light hover backgrounds, subtle shadows, faint overlays. Minimally perceptible change.

20.$description: opacity.20 — 20% opacity - light transparency. Use for: hover states, light overlays, muted backgrounds. Noticeable but unobtrusive.

25.$description: opacity.25 — 25% opacity - quarter visible. Use for: skeleton loading states, light dimming, subtle backgrounds. Common for placeholder content.

30.$description: opacity.30 — 30% opacity - moderate transparency. Use for: image overlays, text shadows, moderate dimming. Visible but allows content behind to show clearly.

40.$description: opacity.40 — 40% opacity - semi-transparent. Use for: medium overlays, watermarks, partially hidden content. Balanced visibility.

50.$description: opacity.50 — 50% opacity - half visible. Use for: disabled elements (semantic alias: 'disabled'), balanced overlays, de-emphasized content. CAUTION: May not meet contrast requirements for text.

60.$description: opacity.60 — 60% opacity - mostly visible. Use for: modal backdrops (semantic alias: 'overlay'), dimmed backgrounds, focus-drawing overlays. Content behind is visible but de-emphasized.

70.$description: opacity.70 — 70% opacity - high visibility. Use for: heavy overlays, strong dimming, de-emphasized backgrounds. Most content visible but clearly secondary.

75.$description: opacity.75 — 75% opacity - three-quarters visible. Use for: dark overlays, strong backgrounds, significant dimming. Mostly solid with hint of transparency.

80.$description: opacity.80 — 80% opacity - mostly solid. Use for: nearly-opaque overlays, frosted glass effects (with backdrop-filter), heavy backgrounds.

90.$description: opacity.90 — 90% opacity - nearly solid. Use for: subtle transparency effects, slight see-through, glass-like surfaces. Almost indistinguishable from solid.

100.$description: opacity.100 — Fully opaque (100%). Use for: solid elements, removing inherited transparency, default element state. CSS: opacity: 1; (default browser value).

disabled.$description: opacity.disabled — Disabled element opacity (50%). SEMANTIC alias for opacity.50. Use for: disabled buttons, inactive controls, unavailable options. Universally recognized as 'inactive'. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure disabled elements are still perceivable and their disabled state is communicated via aria-disabled.

overlay.$description: opacity.overlay — Modal overlay opacity (60%). SEMANTIC alias for opacity.60. Use for: modal backdrops, lightbox backgrounds, focus-drawing overlays. Dims background while keeping it visible for context. Common in: Modal backdrop, Drawer overlay, image lightbox backgrounds.

scale.$description: mantine.scale — Global scale factor for Mantine components. 1 = default size, 0.8 = 80% size, 1.2 = 120% size.

cursorType.$description: mantine.cursorType — Cursor style for interactive elements. 'pointer' for clickable, 'default' for standard.

webkitFontSmoothing.$description: mantine.webkitFontSmoothing — WebKit font smoothing. 'antialiased' for crisp text on macOS/iOS.

mozFontSmoothing.$description: mantine.mozFontSmoothing — Mozilla font smoothing. 'grayscale' for crisp text on Firefox.

headingFontWeight.$description: mantine.headingFontWeight — Default font weight for all headings (h1-h6).

headingTextWrap.$description: mantine.headingTextWrap — Text wrapping behavior for headings. 'wrap' allows line breaks, 'balance' balances lines.

radiusDefault.$description: mantine.radiusDefault — Default border radius when no size is specified. References radius.sm token.

max.$description: mantine.zIndex.max — Maximum z-index for critical elements

primary.$description: brand.primary — Primary brand color. Navy Blue used in logo 'Clear' letterforms and headings.

secondary.$description: brand.secondary — Secondary brand color. Sky Blue used in logo 'Co.' letterforms and subheadings.

tertiary.$description: brand.tertiary — Tertiary brand color. Purple for typography accents and supporting elements.

accent.$description: brand.accent — Accent color. Yellow for decorative highlights only — never as main color or text.

onPrimary.$description: brand.onPrimary — Text/foreground on primary (Navy Blue) background.

onSecondary.$description: brand.onSecondary — Text/foreground on secondary (Sky Blue) background.

onAccent.$description: brand.onAccent — Text/foreground on accent (Yellow) background. Uses Navy Blue for contrast.
